summary: This mod gives proper lizard feet to argonians.
descriptionHtml:
While there's already mods that changes argonian appearance, I was still wondering if I could do something better and more realistic. This mod replaces the boring human looking vanilla feet with my model, inspired by real world reptiles and lore friendly. Finally Argonians look like reptiles.

If you want beast races to have similar look they had in Morrowind, take a look to Unique Beast Races:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6041
Actually, I'm working on that mod myself :)
Take a look to the progress:
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/935973-unique-beast-races-wip/
This mod is not related and has nothing to see with Unique Beast Races. It's just a different view of Argonians.

Update:
Fixed open footwears!

Credits:
Grimoa for various help.

Compatibility:
With every retexture as I adapted uv maps for the vanilla textures.
I have a compatibilty version for Grimoas Plantigrade Feet if you want to keep khajiit feets. The mod is required for this but you don't need to activate Gri_BeastFeet.esp, just the compatibility version itself.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16976

Recommended:
Better Beast Races
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/

Permission:
Just pm me if you want to include this in your mod.
author: Derok
